channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Luigi Mangione under ‘constant watch’ in prison to prevent ‘Epstein-style situation’

item.title: Sutton's predictions v Tailenders host Felix White
item.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Felix White - and AI - with his predictions for the midweek Premier League fixtures.

item.title: Mangione in court as lawyers seek to rule out notebook, gun and other key evidence
item.description: A legal expert explains how the defence could stand to gain even if their longshot bid fails this week.

item.title: Zelensky says Ukraine territory 'most difficult' issue, as US envoy prepares to meet Putin
item.description: US envoy Steve Witkoff and Donald Trump's adviser and son-in-law Jared Kushner will meet Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

item.title: Teenage girl dies in minibus crash near school
item.description: The teenager was travelling in a minibus when it collided with a car in Toulston Lane, police say.

item.title: Car-sharing company ZipCar to end UK operations
item.description: ZipCar, which has more than 600,000 UK members, temporarily suspends new bookings on its platform.
